intent.user_query: What is the total number of unique customers who have purchased each product?

phases.goal: Execute SQL query on fitness_db: SELECT p.ProductName, COUNT(DISTINCT s.CustomerID) AS UniqueCustomers FROM fitness_db.Products p JOIN fitness_db.SaleDetails sd ON p.ProductID = sd.ProductID JOIN fitness_db.Sales s ON sd.SaleID = s.SaleID GROUP BY p.ProductName;

arguments.sql: SELECT p.ProductName, COUNT(DISTINCT s.CustomerID) AS UniqueCustomers FROM fitness_db.Products p JOIN fitness_db.SaleDetails sd ON p.ProductID = sd.ProductID JOIN fitness_db.Sales s ON sd.SaleID = s.SaleID GROUP BY p.ProductName;

phases.goal: Generate the final report based on the query results.
